Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor parking space database schema with scalable format

- Added space_code field (e.g., "2B4" = 2nd floor, column B, slot 4)
- Created parking_floors and parking_columns configuration tables
- Updated API to support both old (sensor_id) and new (space_code) formats
- Organized floor details view by columns with cleaner display
- Added ParkingConfigController for managing floors and columns
- Models: ParkingSpace, ParkingFloor, ParkingColumn, ParkingConfig
- Migrations for new database structure
- Updated Livewire dashboard to show spaces grouped by column
